75329.「……<pc>か。\n そろそろ 戻ってくると思っていたぞ。: I had a feeling you'd be here.

75330.「そなたが アンルシアとともに\n ３つの神の緋石を 守ってくれたことは\n す:
I heard that you and Anlucia protected the
three Divine Crimsonites.

75331.「まことに ご苦労であった。\n これで 大魔王といえども 神の緋石に\n おい:
Well done. Now even the Demon Lord
cannot tamper with them so easily.

75332.「そして 世界の運命も 大きく変わった。\n そなたに託した 運命の振り子にも\:
The fate of the world has changed drastically.
The Pendulum of Fate must be filled to the
brim with power.

75333.「さっそくだが 運命の振り子を使い\n 新たな運命の特異点を 確認したいと思う。:
And now, with the pendulum, I'd like to
identify the new point of destiny. Please
gather around.

75337.「古き神の遺跡にあった緋石は 壊された。\n それにより 新たな運命の特異点が\:
The Crimsonite in the Historic Ruins was
destroyed... so I wouldn't be surprised if a
new point of destiny emerged nearby...

75340.「運命の振り子が……。\n いったい 何が起きたのですか？: The pendulum... why has it shattered?

75341.「……何者かが 運命が変異することを\n 妨害したとしか 考えられぬな。\n 振:
I seems that someone or something has
interfered with the new destiny. I felt a
terrible power emanating from it.

75342.「ごめんなさい <cs_pchero>。\n 私のほうが 遅かっ……。: Sorry about that. I was too sl...

75343.「……これは いったい！？\n 前に来たときと まるで ちがう場所だわ。\n や:
What happened here?! This place looks nothing
like it did before...is this the Demon Lord's
doing...?

75345.「あの宙に浮いている物体……あそこから\n とても まがまがしいものを感じるの…:
That thing floating in the air... I feel
something very sinister coming from it...

75346.「とにかく あれが なんなのか\n 調べてみる必要があるわね。\n 近くまで 行:
Anyway, we need to find out what that thing
really is. Let's get closer!

75348.<center>\n……勇者と その盟友よ。\n余の居城……魔幻宮殿へ ようこそ:
The Hero and her ally...
Welcome to my domain, the Demon Palace.

75350.<center>\n余の名は 大魔王マデサゴーラ。\n古き世界の破壊者にして\n:
I am the Demon Lord Madesagora.
Destroyer of the old world, and creator of
my new world.

75352.「姿を見せなさい 大魔王っ！\n 偽りの世界を創り 兄さまをも利用して\n いっ:
Show yourself, demon! You've created a false
world and are using my brother as a puppet.
What are you planning?!

75353.<center>\nついに 世界の侵食が始まったのだ。\nそなたの兄が 神の緋石:
At last, the destruction of the world has
begun. And it's all thanks to your brother
destroying the Divine Crimsonite.

75354.<center>\n余の目的は ひとつ。\n古びた世界を 自ら創りし世界で侵食し:
I have but one goal: to replace the world
with one of my own creation, and give birth to
a world of my own design.

75355.「やはり……。偽りの世界を使って\n この世界を 乗っ取るというのが\n あなた:
I knew it... your goal all along was to take
over this world using a false one!

75356.<center>\n余を止めたいか 勇者よ？\nだが ともに戦う盟友を得たとて\:
Do you wish to stop me, Hero? Even with an
ally by your side, your efforts are futile
all the same.

75357.<center>\n盟友と呼ばれようとも その者の心の奥底には\n拭い去ることの:
Even your so called ally has fears lurking
inside of them that will never fade away.
Allow me to indulge you.

75359.<center>\nこれこそ その者の心に潜む 恐怖の形。\n避けることのできな:
This is the form their fear has taken deep
inside of their heart. The fear of death
itself, which is inevitable.

75363.「……アンルシアから 話は聞いた。\n ソーラリア峡谷に 大魔王マデサゴーラの\:
Anlucia told me what happened...it appears
that the Demon Lord's castle has appeared in
Solaria Canyon.

75364.「トーマによって 神の緋石が壊されたことで\n 大魔王のもくろみである 世界の侵:
With the destruction of the Divine Crimsonite
by Toma, the Demon Lord's plan to
destroy the world has finally begun...

75365.「……こう考えることもできる。\n 大魔王自ら こちらの世界に現れたのならば\n:
...But let's think of it this way. If the
Demon Lord himself is now in this world,
this is our best chance to defeat him.

75366.「ですが 大魔王の居城を守る結界は\n 私のチカラでは 破ることはできませんでし:
Unfortunately, my power wasn't able to break
the barrier surrounding his castle...

75367.「勇者のチカラをもってしても\n 破れぬ結界か……。:
A barrier that cannot be broken by even the
Hero's power...

75368.「破邪の秘技も すべて覚え\n 盟友 <pc>の協力もあります。\n それでも:
I've learned all of the Sacred Skills, and
have <pc>'s support, but...
Even that isn't strong enough...

75369.「アンルシア……そなたには まだひとつだけ\n 勇者として 欠けているものがある:
Anlucia...there is one thing you still lack as
a Hero.

75373.「伝説によれば かつて ペガサスは\n 悪しき者の作りし結界を破り\n 勇者を勝:
Legend has it that the Pegasus once led a
Hero to victory by breaking through a barrier
created by an evil being...

75374.「ペガサスのチカラが借りられれば\n 大魔王の居城の結界を 破れるかもしれん。:
If we can use its power, we may be able to
break through the barrier surrounding that
castle.

75375.「しかし ペガサスが 本当に存在するのか？\n 存在したとして 今 どこにいるの:
But does the Pegasus really exist? If it
does... I don't know where.

75376.「叡智の冠のチカラを 今一度 結集し\n ペガサスの所在を 突き止めてみよう。:
I shall gather the strength of the Crown of
Wisdom once more to locate the Pegasus'
whereabouts.

75379.「ペガサス……。\n この世界の どこかにいるのなら\n どうか 私にチカラを貸:
Pegasus... if you're somewhere out there...
Please lend me your strength...

79422.「大魔王マデサゴーラは\n ついに その居城とともに\n 我々の世界へと 現れた:
The Demon Lord Madesagora has finally
appeared in our world, along with his
castle...

79423.「そして 間もなく 勇者と盟友は\n 大魔王に挑む 宿命の時を迎える。\n 多く:
Soon, the fated battle against the Demon Lord
shall come...with the fates of so many others
intertwined...

79425.「今は 静かに お眠りください。\n 目覚めの時が訪れる その時まで……。:
Please sleep peacefully for now. Until the
time of your awakening comes...

80239.「運命を司る 聖なる振り子よ。\n 新たな運命の変異を うながしたまえ……。\n:
Oh, sacred Pendulum of Fate... guide us to a
new destiny, and show us the path we must
take...

80243.「これで 我らは 導きを失った……。\n これより先は 自身のチカラだけで\n:
We have lost our guidance... We must now
rely on our strength alone to create our own
path of destiny.

80245.「あの遺跡での戦いで 私は\n 兄さまを止めることが できなかった……。: I wasn't able to stop my brother last time...

80246.「すぐに 向かいます。\n これ以上 大魔王の好きには させません！:
But I will stand tall! I won't let the Demon
Lord have his way any longer!

80248.「<cs_pchero>！ あの魔物は\n 大魔王マデサゴーラが あなたの心の底:
<cs_pchero>! That monster is the Demon Lord
Madesagora taking the form of the fear
that lies deep within you.

80249.「でも 私は あなたが そんなものに\n 負けるはずはないと 信じているわ！:
But I have faith that you will not be defeated
by such a thing!

80251.<center>\n……果たして そうかな？\nそなたたちは 弱い生き物よ。\n:
Is that so? You are weak creatures. You
cannot go against your own hearts.

80252.<center>\nいま一度 おのれの恐怖と向き合え。\nそして 勇者ともども:
Face your own fear once more, and then you
and the hero will perish.

80253.<center>\n哀れなる勇者よ。\n頼みと信じた 盟友の恐怖に押しつぶされ\:
Woe to you, Hero. You shall be crushed by
the fears of your trusted ally, and will
perish here and now.

80254.<center>\n……ほう。心の底に潜んだ恐怖を\n打ち払うことが できるとは:
Impressive... I thought it impossible
to vanquish the fears that lie in the depths
of one's heart.

80255.「私たちは あんなものに 負けない。\n 次は あなたを倒すわ！！:
There's no way we could lose. We are coming
after you next!!

80256.<center>\nならば この居城の深淵まで 来るがいい。\n余の作りだした結:
Then come. Come into the depths of my castle.
...that is, if you can break through this
barrier I have created.

80258.<center>\nそなたたちは 余の理想の世界の到来を\n指をくわえて 見てい:
Watch with bated breath as my ideal world
inevitably comes... Gahahahaha....

80259.「待っていなさい 大魔王マデサゴーラ。\n 私は 絶対に あなたを倒すわ。\n:
Wait for me, Madesagora. I will defeat you,
and I will rescue my brother!

80260.「<cs_pchero>。くやしいけど\n 大魔王が言った通り 今の私たちには\:
It's just as Madesagora said...we have no way
to break through this barrier right now.

80261.「一度 グランゼドーラ城に戻って\n ルシェンダさまに 相談してみましょう。\n:
Let's go back to the castle and tell Lushenda
what has happened here. I'll see you there!

90234.「ふたたび あの地で\n 何かが 起こるというのでしょうか？: Is something going to happen there again?

90236.「アンルシア <pc>。\n ソーラリア峡谷の様子を 見にいってくれるか？\n:
Can you two go to Solaria Canyon to
investigate? We need to know what's going on
there.

90237.「私は 先に向かっているわ。\n あなたも準備をしたら すぐに来て。: I'm heading out. Come as soon as you're ready.

90238.「今のソーラリア峡谷には\n これまでにない危険が 待っているかもしれぬ。\n:
Solaria Canyon may be more dangerous than
ever before. Please be careful.

90239.「先代の勇者さまとともに\n 悪しき者と戦ったと 伝説に出てくる\n 空を駆ける:
Are you referring to the legendary flying
horse that fought against evil with the Heroes
of the past?

90240.「アンルシア。それに <pc>。\n 何か わかったときは すぐに教える。\n:
I'll let you both know when I have more
information. Please wait until then.

90241.「<pc>も 今は 時を待ちましょう。:
Looks like we just have to wait,
<pc>.
